group.name: moneybookers
group.string: To have access to the international payment network of Moneybookers please register here for a free account if you donâ€™t have one yet. More information can be found here.

Quick Checkout enables you to take payments from credit cards, debit cards and over 50 other local payment options in over 200 countries.
The highly competitive rates for this service are published on the Moneybookers website at www.moneybookers.com. More information can be found here.
